type.name: org.gradle.language.rc.tasks.WindowsResourceCompile
type.description: Compiles Windows Resource scripts into .res files.

method.name: getIncludes
method.description: Returns the header directories to be used for compilation.

method.name: getOutputDir
method.description: The directory where object files will be generated.

method.name: includes
method.description: Add directories where the compiler should search for header files.

method.name: getToolChain
method.description: The tool chain used for compilation.

method.name: getSource
method.description: Returns the source files to be compiled.

method.name: getMacros
method.description: Macros that should be defined for the compiler.

method.name: getCompilerArgs
method.description: Additional arguments to provide to the compiler.

method.name: source
method.description: Adds a set of source files to be compiled. The provided sourceFiles object is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...).

property.name: macros
property.description: Macros that should be defined for the compiler.

property.name: includes
property.description: Returns the header directories to be used for compilation.

property.name: source
property.description: Returns the source files to be compiled.

property.name: toolChain
property.description: The tool chain used for compilation.

property.name: compilerArgs
property.description: Additional arguments to provide to the compiler.

property.name: outputDir
property.description: The directory where object files will be generated.
